title: Continuing Medical Education and Change Management Strategies: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: General Understanding of Basic Medical Systems and Curriculum Design
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/Job Seekers, Domain Expertise: Beginner, Delivery Mode: Bring Your Own Device (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three change barriers (e.g., time constraints, habits, work environment) that may occur in CME programs
Learners can design change management strategies through project-based activities and apply them to real scenarios
Learners can revise and optimize their change management plans based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
